name: Divorian
description:
Welcome To Divorian! 
In this game you will be playing as a robot, Once used to be human but somehow turned into a robot. You also want to solve global warming, So in this game, you will be solving 2 tasks, Becoming human again and solving global warming. You will have to platform a bunch and solve puzzles to complete each level. Randomly you will be teleported to laboratories, I wonder who even owns them... Find that at the end of the game. 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
In Divorian there are 6 levels, And in levels, there are parts (for most of them). I thought to add parts in levels so the game isn't super short because I want the game to be a solid 30 minutes which it should be unless if ur a literal speedrunner.  This game has been made with A TON of effort and I would love to see feedback on the game so if you play this game please leave feedback in the comments! 

Enjoy Divorian!

Divorian has just released a patch! 

This patch includes If you vault out of the map u will DIE, If you crash DONT WORRY YOUR PROGRESS WILL BE SAVED! Kylox (Final Boss) Health has been lowered to 500 instead of 1000. I also fixed some dialogue messages lol
